turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order some pizza from Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which one do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Macon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Why don't you surprise me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok any special requests

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't want want to break the bank so Get a speical if they have it. I do prefer at least 2 toppings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir. I believe they have a special on Large two topping pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just a couple of Larges. Maybe some soda.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will have to order it online. then pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get it within an hour. I am getting hungry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I don't think that will be a problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe I should have you pick up Casey's instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whatever you want sir.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh never mind just stick with Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Those pizzas will not have any special crust. Just hand tossed

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is what I prefer anyway. Not so greasy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will get them ordered and head that way.
